address: Xã Đại An, Huyện Trà Cú, Tỉnh Trà Vinh
thought:
**Analysis of Address Change: Xã Đại An, Huyện Trà Cú, Tỉnh Trà Vinh**

Okay, here's what I've determined. My initial step was to focus on the province, "Tỉnh Trà Vinh," as the primary driver of any potential administrative changes. Given my expertise, I knew to first check for any province mergers or reorganizations, specifically referencing Resolution 60-NQ/TW. This quickly led me to understand that "Tỉnh Trà Vinh" had been merged into "Tỉnh Vĩnh Long."

Next, I needed to identify the fate of "Xã Đại An".  I shifted my focus to resolutions pertaining to "Tỉnh Vĩnh Long." My primary search tool was "Other resolutions," meticulously filtering for "Xã Đại An" within the context of the newly formed "Tỉnh Vĩnh Long." Resolution 1687/NQ-UBTVQH15 stood out immediately. Line 51 directly addressed the combination of several administrative units, including "Xã Đại An", *to form a new Xã Đại An*. This felt promising.

To solidify my analysis, I cross-referenced this with the "New wards" data.  My search parameters were precise: `{"ward_name":"Xã Đại An","province_name":"Tỉnh Vĩnh Long"}`.  The match `{"ward_code":"29491","ward_name":"Xã Đại An","province_name":"Tỉnh Vĩnh Long"}` confirmed my initial finding. The clarity and directness of the resolution gave me a very high confidence level.

To ensure there were no conflicting interpretations, I exhaustively checked *other* resolutions. I systematically examined mentions of "Xã Đại An" across different provinces (Đà Nẵng, Ninh Bình, Phú Thọ) to rule out any potential ambiguities. None of these mentions were relevant to "Tỉnh Trà Vinh" (or, by extension, "Tỉnh Vĩnh Long").

My conclusion is clear: the new administrative unit for "Xã Đại An, Huyện Trà Cú, Tỉnh Trà Vinh" is "Xã Đại An" with ward code "29491" in the province of "Tỉnh Vĩnh Long." This analysis is robust and supported by the relevant resolutions.

citation.header: 1687/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Vĩnh Long
citation.line: 51. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Định An, xã Định An và xã Đại An thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Đại An.
